channel.title: All these 317's
channel.description:
I'm coming back after a couple years' break to find that people are still primarily running 317s. I remeber overhauling czar based servers and my god was it ugly. From what I've heard this "PI" base is almost as bad.
So my question is, is there a decent 562+ base out there? One that isn't a botched 317 overhaul with code in all the wrong places? Right now I'm trying to progress on an element-X based server, which I believe is based off of painzones' source(although I have yet to look at PZ.*shrug*), but so many functions are redundant and/or broken. It looks like it was a decent base and then some kid decided to copy-paste a bunch of shitty content into it.
Thanks for your responses in advance, --lanced
